thread.title: Cowboys will spend week determining whether Bryant can play
thread.title_full: Cowboys will spend week determining whether Bryant can play

author: wtopstaff
title: Cowboys will spend week determining whether Bryant can play
text:
Home » News » Sports » NFL » Cowboys will spend week… Cowboys will spend week determining whether Bryant can play By SCHUYLER DIXON October 20, 2015 6:19 pm 
IRVING, Texas (AP) — Dez Bryant’s status will be evaluated all week as the Dallas Cowboys decide whether the star receiver can return six weeks after breaking his right foot in the season opener. 
Coach Jason Garrett said there was no “Magna Carta” of checkpoints the team was following to determine whether Bryant would return against the New York Giants on Sunday. He broke his foot in a win over New York. 
Cowboys owner Jerry Jones said there was no “set line of demarcation on this or anything.” 
Garrett and Jones said Bryant’s feedback will have a lot to do with the decision on the 2014 All-Pro’s return. The Cowboys have lost three straight games without Tony Romo and Bryant. 
___
